entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
